name: Element TD
description: Light, Darkness, Water, Fire, Nature, and Earth elements come together in this tower defense focused on combinations.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 Bit Processor: Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: At least 128MB of video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
